Banff International String Quartet Competition 2025

December 21 2025 music ResourcesForComposers, string-quartet

For the 2025 edition of the BISQC, the following quartets participated:

Name From Place Web
Arete Quartet Seoul, South Korea 2 sites.google.com/view/aretequartet/home
Cong Quartet Hong Kong, China www.congquartet.com
Quatuor Elmire Paris, France www.quatuor-elmire.com
Quartett HANA Munich, Germany hanaquartet.com
Quartet KAIRI Salzburg, Austria 3
Quatuor Magenta Paris, France www.quatuormagenta.com
Myriade Quartet Montreal, Canada Withdrew myriadequartet.com
Nerida Quartet Bremen, Germany www.neridaquartet.com
Poiesis Quartet Cincinnati, United States of America 1 poiesisquartet.com
Viatores Quartet Berlin, Germany www.viatoresquartet.com
